org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.activity

Class DirectedGraphActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.activity.BaseActivity
      • org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.activity.DirectedGraphActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasLabels, Activity, HasChildActivities

    public class DirectedGraphActivity
extends BaseActivity
implements HasChildActivities
    Activity containing a directed acyclic graph (DAG) of child activities.
    Author:
    clc

      Listener interface for directed graph activity events
